name: Shmumbley Shpoompley
description:
CONTROLS :

Help Shmumbley and Shpoompley make coffee for the whole staff of the Blumzy corporation !!!

Use the C, O, F and E keys at the right time to brew your best coffee !

A little game made for Trijam #120 Coffee. 

The goal was to make a game in 3h, here are our respective production time : 

Prud’hom Miguel 3h : character design and animation 

Banti Konrad 5h : dev on Unity (some extra time  to add sound and replace the timer with 3 lives)

And, as always, good luck and have fun !

Free Assets used :

Sprites

- pixel-heart-animation-32x32-16x16-freebie by NicoleMarieT

- pixel-art-stone-floorwall by Muhammad Shahrom Ali

- industrial-parallax-background by ansimuz

- conveyor-belts-spritesheet-anims by Color Optimist

Audio

- Button 14.mp3 by Coral_Island_Studios

- metal rollers conveyor belt with no belt to bring boxes to store basement normal and slow prickly gritty movement.flac by kyles

- Water.wav by wildc4rd

- coffee slurp 2 by benken.23

- Clank1.wav by BMacZero

-Industrial Harbor Atmosphere, far away in Valparaiso (Chile) by felix.blume

- Disco funk loops 001 remix 1 short loop with drums 120 bpm.wav by josefpres
